meanings.definition: Showing embarrassment or lack of self-confidence.
meanings.sent1: After spilling his drink at the party, he had a sheepish look on his face.
meanings.sent2: She felt sheepish when she realized she had forgotten her lines on stage.
meanings.sent3: His sheepishness at the meeting made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The sheepishness in her eyes revealed her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The sheepishness in his smile was endearing to everyone.

meanings.definition: A feeling of embarrassment or lack of self-confidence.
meanings.sent1: The student's sheepishness was evident when he couldn't answer the teacher's question.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't hide her sheepishness when she tripped in front of everyone.
meanings.sent3: His sheepishness about his mistake was palpable in the room.
meanings.sent4: The sheepishness in the air was thick after the awkward encounter.
meanings.sent5: The sheepishness in the atmosphere was hard to ignore.
